caption: Space combining illustration and creation for children and fans of beautiful images! Adapted and caring workshops :)
Exhibitions and shows for children. Great ! Our 2 year old son loved the puppet and ukulele show!

Bookstore specializing in children's illustration, exhibition space and workshops... Openings and signings every month. Warm team passionate about cultural mediation since 2012... a place to discover as a family.
Great place of culture for little ones! selection of colorful books, small exhibition and workshops to introduce them to art... can't wait to come back.
Friendly place, small room for small groups, storyteller who knows how to tell stories ðŸ‘Œ. Short show (35 minutes) ideal for an age group of 12 months, also good for the 3 year old big sister.

Artymini workshop led by a person incompetent to work with children under 3 years old. In addition to her incompetence, she is stressful and aggressive. It's difficult for little ones to stay focused on the activity in a place overloaded with things that could distract them
Small 2 in 1 space, it's nice but more for the little ones. There is choice in reading and pretty paintings that you can buy.

I recommend this museum a thousand times! A very small cultural place, it is intended for the artistic awakening of children. For me, it fulfilled its role perfectly. Every month there are temporary exhibitions by contemporary artists (this month for example, illustrations by Mariachiara Di Giorgio, from the album "La soup Lepron"). Based on these works, workshops adapted to each age (yes, even for babies!) are offered. The best thing about all of this? Children awaken to art without realizing it! You will also find a bookstore corner with a selection of essential gems, and even a few games.  A warm and cozy place, we quickly got around it (which is really good for the youngest!).

A little paradise for children, parents and grandparents. Impossible to stop by and take a look and leave empty-handed. Under the spell. I stopped by on the evening of Louise Drul's opening and these were signed books and lithographs that were acquired. Very beautiful works.

I am disappointed by the lack of flexibility on the dates, you have to commit to dates at the start of the year, which I understand perfectly, but it is then impossible to change in the event of family events beyond our control , even 2 to 3 months in advance, when the groups are not full! So here are three lost lessons for our child. I find that very damaging. I will not re-register it and I advise against it for parents who do not know their June schedule from September! But bankrupt for Pocket Museum!!!

If I could give no stars... the visit did not take place, too bad for my son. This is because management asked for solidarity (due to the health context) which it was unable to provide. In short: 0 empathy, 0 understanding. Neither I nor those around me will ever go to the pocket museum.  Publicly you attempt empathy but this was not the case during our email exchange.

A nice selection of children's books. Furthermore, the plastic arts workshops are very popular with children (collages, finger painting, etc.). The staff is very attentive and caring. An address to remember!

I find that the Pocket Museum is a truly wonderful place that deserves to be known. The approach to making children aware of art is done with intelligence and good taste. In addition, the prices are quite affordable... The owner of the place, Pauline Lamy, knows her subject perfectly and is very welcoming. Donâ€™t hesitate to consult the schedule of the many activities offered!
Please keep in mind: if you cancel less than 24 hours before, even for medical reasons, there is no refund possible.

A nice little place very suitable for children! A place that perfectly knows how to combine entertainment and culture. The girls who take care of the children are very sweet and pleasant. I highly recommend.
A little cultural paradise for children with diverse activities at reasonable prices. Thank you Pauline for the quality of the workshops offered. Itâ€™s a great discovery!
a very nice activity especially for little ones. There are few cultural offerings dedicated to these ages. Thank you for thinking of them (and us ;))

A year that NoÃ©mie (6 years old) and Adrien (4 years old) participate in various workshops and outings (NoÃ©mie is registered with Escap'art) at the MusÃ©e de Poche, a year that they discover, share, experiment around art, a year that they come home proud of themselves every time, thanks to the wonderful work of Pauline Lamy and her team. And what joy for parents to (re)discover through their eyes... Long live this wonderful place!

Very good initiative to introduce our little ones to something other than cinemas or shopping centers during the school holidays. A downside on the navigation of the site, often confusing, busy and therefore unclear (lots of openings of secondary and tertiary pages). Edit: Site still not updated technically speaking, we are left wandering around with clicks, submenus and obscure tree structures. Less is better!
A warm place to learn and have fun and explore the capital's temporary exhibitions. The store is full of ideas for original and educational gifts! a place that we can only recommend!

A lovely place full of illustration treasures, beautiful objects and small, constantly changing exhibitions that reveal the worlds of always different artists. The team takes their work to heart and it shows!

Thank you for these good times spent with my children. They came back with lots of ideas. I recommend the pocket museum for the quality of the workshops and the professionalism of Pauline. See you soon
A very welcoming and warm place which offers not only quality exhibitions but also top workshops for children! I will come back without hesitation!
Magical place. Lots of gift ideas for little tough guys and girls! Top facilitators. Thank you for the Saturday morning workshop... The artistic boost of our weekend...
No empathy, it's very sad, should not work with children...

a really very, very nice gallery run by a lovely person, with amazing illustration exhibitions, a very nice selection of books that will appeal to young and old alike, and lots of new, creative and quality gift ideas.
A fun and warm place, which allows children to flourish and learn through art. Really very interesting director and great teacher with children.
Really high quality workshops! My daughter has been going there regularly since she was 2.5 years old and she loves it.
Very warm welcome. Very nice exhibition. We find happiness at the bookstore
I really enjoyed my visit to this lovely place. The welcome is perfect and the activities offered are very relevant. Thank you.
A very original place where children can use their imagination, a very nice approach to art for little ones Also organized outings AT THE TOP!
Not sure about the material used if it is suitable for little ones otherwise a nice souvenir
A superb place for children, a remarkable choice of exhibitions and original workshops, young and old, we come away with stars in our eyes!
Something to delight the little children who are looked after by an adorable team for a good hour!!
A fun setting brilliantly run by friendly and competent girls. Their exhibitions have never disappointed me and neither has their reception!
Exhibitions always very beautiful, very good choice of books and Pauline organizes great workshops!
A magical place run by very pretty witches, for young and old children. To be encouraged!
A big thank you to the Musee de Poche!! Unforgettable day for my children! I recommend it without moderation!
